welcome.greeting: Welcome to my interactive portfolio! I'd be glad to share more about my work and experience with you. May I know your name?
welcome.niceMeet: Nice to meet you, {{name}}! Are you a recruiter, potential client, or looking to collaborate?

categories.selectPrompt: Great! Here are some questions you might have. Feel free to explore any that interest you:

actions.thanksMessage: Thanks for exploring my portfolio! Feel free to restart or reach out anytime.
actions.anotherQuestion: Would you like to explore another question?
actions.allExplored: You've explored all the questions! Would you like to start over or check out my work?

hero.title: Explore My
hero.description: Chat with my AI assistant to learn about my experience, projects, and expertise in UI/UX design and front-end development.

recruiter.question: What is your expertise?
recruiter.answer: I specialize in UI/UX Design & Front-end Development, with hands-on experience in Next.js, Vite, Angular, React, Shadcn UI, TailwindCSS, Bootstrap, along with creative tools like Figma, Sketch, Adobe Suite, and AI Prompting.

recruiter.question: What industries have you worked in?
recruiter.answer: I've designed and developed solutions for Healthcare, Banking, Social Apps, HR Solutions, Government & Military domains, Booking systems, Service portals, E-commerce, and Creative Branding projects.

recruiter.question: Do you have experience with collaborative projects?
recruiter.answer: Yes. I've worked in design agencies, startups, and government regulators, collaborating closely with developers, analysts, product owners, and stakeholders.

recruiter.question: What are your core skills?
recruiter.answer: My key strengths include UI/UX Design, Branding, Front-end Development, Interactive Prototyping, Responsive Layouts, Component Libraries, and CMS Websites.

recruiter.question: Can you share some main projects?
recruiter.answer: A few highlights: HR Management Dashboard (Next.js + Shadcn), Booking & Appointment System, Government Health Regulatory Portal, Government Attendance System with Live Actions, Police & Military Digital Solutions, E-commerce & Business Websites, Interactive Landing Pages & Personal Portfolio.

recruiter.question: How can I contact you?
recruiter.answer: You can reach me via my Portfolio Website, LinkedIn, Email, or WhatsApp. I'm also happy to share my CV upon request.

client.question: What services do you provide?
client.answer: I help businesses with UI/UX design, prototyping, branding, and front-end development to turn concepts into functional, user-friendly products.

client.question: Can you customize dashboards or booking systems?
client.answer: Absolutely. I create custom dashboards, booking platforms, attendance portals, and workflow tools tailored to your business needs.

client.question: Do you also work with branding and identity?
client.answer: Yes. I provide branding, logo design, and UI style guides, ensuring your product identity aligns with your audience.

client.question: What's your design and development process?
client.answer: My workflow: Requirements & Research ‚Üí Wireframes ‚Üí Figma Prototypes / Branding Concepts ‚Üí Front-end Build (Next.js / Shadcn / TailwindCSS).

client.question: Do you work on XR/AR/VR projects?
client.answer: Yes! I have explored XR (AR/VR/MR) and plan to feature more immersive experiences in my portfolio.

client.question: How can we start working together?
client.answer: Reach me via Portfolio Website, LinkedIn, or WhatsApp. I'm open to freelance, contract, or project-based work.

collaborator.question: What's your tech stack?
collaborator.answer: I mainly use Next.js, React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Shadcn UI, Framer Motion, and design tools like Figma & Adobe Suite.

collaborator.question: Do you work on open-source or side projects?
collaborator.answer: Yes! I enjoy building tools, UI kits, dashboards, and experimental portfolio projects.

collaborator.question: Are you involved in any startups?
collaborator.answer: Yes, I'm part of Mouzee.Tech, a startup team focused on digital products, UI/UX design, and branding.

collaborator.question: What skills do you bring to a team?
collaborator.answer: I bridge the design-to-code gap, offering UI/UX prototyping, front-end coding, and creative branding.

collaborator.question: Do you collaborate remotely?
collaborator.answer: Yes, I'm flexible with remote collaboration, async workflows, and modern team tools.

collaborator.question: Where can I connect with you?
collaborator.answer: Let's connect via Portfolio Website, GitHub, or LinkedIn. I'm always open to interesting collaborations!
